title: 605  - Yesterday's Enterprise | Sleep With TNG
description:
Gonna go back in time for this bedtime story, all the way back to a time when prune juice was a cool drink. (Trek talk at about 20:58)

Thanks to all the listeners who give “value for value” by becoming patrons on Patreon @ http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com/patron

Commission a Song from Jonathan Mann @ song.jonathanmann.net
